video:video.video:title: How to Enter the Turkish Market - Video Guide
video:video.video:description: Complete legal guide for foreign companies entering the Turkish market. Expert analysis of market entry models, company formation, regulatory compliance, and tax structuring under Turkish law.

video:video.video:title: How to Spot Fake Clinics in Turkey - Medical Tourism Legal Guide
video:video.video:description: Learn how to verify legitimate clinics in Turkey and avoid scams. A practical legal guide for medical tourists on checking licenses, spotting red flags, and ensuring safety.
